# Hyphenated suffixes in the following list are not split into multiple tokens.
# Euro-centric and element-wise are both single tokens.

able
ahol
aholic
ation
centric
cracy
crat
dom
er
ery
esque
ette
fest
fold
ful
gate
gon
hood
ian
ible
ing
isation
ise
ising
ism
ist
itis
ization
ize
izing
less
logist
logy
ly
most
o-torium
rama
wise
